meanings.definition: Say or pronounce clearly and distinctly.
meanings.sent1: She always enunciates her words so everyone can understand.
meanings.sent2: Please enunciate your answer so the whole class can hear.
meanings.sent3: The robot enunciated its commands with robotic precision.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music was enunciated in every note he played.
meanings.sent5: The teacher enunciated the importance of good communication skills.

meanings.sent1: He tried to enunciate his thoughts, but they came out jumbled.
meanings.sent2: It is important to enunciate your intentions to avoid misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: The politician enunciated his promises with confidence.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes enunciated the sadness she felt deep inside.
meanings.sent5: The artist enunciated his vision through his vibrant paintings.
